member.summary: The type of query to perform.

Proj4String parameter. Defaults to 4326.

member.summary:
The Proj4 projection string (coordinate system) of target geometry and results. Mutually exclusive from the
Srid parameter.

member.summary: The distance within which to find features. If not specified, defaults to 200.

member.summary:
The unit of measure in which the
Distance is expressed. Defaults to "Meter".

member.summary: The radius of the search area around the target geometry. If not specified, it's assumed that there is no limit.

member.summary:
The unit of measure in which the

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingLocation
member.summary: A class presents the location for ReverseGeocoding.
member.remarks: A class presents the location for ReverseGeocoding.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingLocation.LocationFeature
member.summary: The feature representing this location. May be a point (e.g. a restaurant), a line (e.g. a road), or a polygon (e.g. a public park or a state boundary).

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingLocation.LocationName
member.summary: The name of this location, e.g. McDonald's.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingLocation.DirectionFromQueryFeature
member.summary: The cardinal direction of this location from the query shape you reverse geocoded. Note: won't apply when you use the reverse geocode area API.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingLocation.DistanceFromQueryFeature
member.summary: The distance of this location from the query shape you reverse geocoded. Note: will always be 0 when you use the reverse geocode area API.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingLocation.LocationCategory
member.summary: The category of this location, e.g. "Road", "Sustenance", "Building", etc. Many of these are based on known OpenStreetMap place categories.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingLocation.LocationType
member.summary: The type of location as defined by its OpenStreetMap type tag. Example 1: A location in the "Road" category may have a PlaceType of "primary". Example 2: A location in the "Building" category may have a PlaceType of "house".

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingLocation.Address
member.summary: The human-readable address of this location.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingLocation.HouseNumber
member.summary: The house number of this location's address.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingLocation.Properties
member.summary: Extended properties of the location. e.g., for a road, may contain properties like the number of lanes, the surface type, whether it is one-way, etc.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingLocation.Postcode
member.summary: The postal code of the location, if applicable. NOTE: Only populated if your request specified ReverseGeocodingResultDetail.Verbose.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingLocation.AddressComponents
member.summary: A dictionary of individual address components, e.g. street, city, country, etc. NOTE: Only populated if your request specified ReverseGeocodingResultDetail.Verbose.

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingOptions
member.summary: A class provides the options for the ReverseGeocoder APIs.
member.remarks: A class provides the options for the ReverseGeocoder APIs.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingOptions.MaxResults
member.summary: The maximun number of results to return. Defaults to 20.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingOptions.LocationCategories
member.summary: The categories of places to include in the result set. The default value is "Common".

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingOptions.ResultDetail
member.summary: Specified that whether the reverse geocoding results should be verbose or not.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingOptions.DistanceUnit
member.summary: The unit of measure in which the distance is expressed. Defaults to "Meter".

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingOptions.LocationTypes
member.summary: Specified the types that should be included in the results. Defautls to empty.

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingResult
member.summary: Represents the result of the ReverseGeocoding.
member.remarks: Represents the result of the ReverseGeocoding.

member.name: M:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingResult.#ctor(ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Shapes.Feature,ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingLocation,ThinkGeo.Cloud.ThinkGeoCloudApplicationException)
member.summary: The constructor of this class.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingResult.QueryFeature
member.summary: The ReverseGeocoding feature.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingResult.BestMatchLocation
member.summary: The best matching location.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingResult.NearbyLocations
member.summary: A collection of the matching location order by the distance ASC.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingResult.Exception
member.summary: The exception when reverse geocoding

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingResultDetail
member.summary: This enumeration specifies whether the reverse geocoding results should be verbose or not.
member.remarks: This enumeration specifies whether the reverse geocoding results should be verbose or not.

member.name: F:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingResultDetail.Default
member.summary: Default value of the enumation, the same as Standard.

member.name: F:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingResultDetail.Verbose
member.summary: This enumeration item means that the reverse geocoding result has all properties

member.name: F:ThinkGeo.Cloud.ReverseGeocodingResultDetail.Standard

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetRouteOptions

member.remarks: A class provides the options for the GetRoute API.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetRouteOptions.TurnByTurn
member.summary: Whether to return turn-by-turn instructions or not. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetRouteOptions.CoordinateSnapRadius
member.summary: The maximum distance of a coordinate can be snapped to the road network, in meters. Defaults to 5000.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetRouteOptions.CoordinateSnapRadiusUnit
member.summary: The unit of the radius to snap the input coordinate to road network. Defaults to Meter.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetRouteOptions.DistanceUnit
member.summary: The unit of measure in which to express the length of the route. Defaults to Meter.

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetRouteResult
member.summary: Represents the result of the GetRoute.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetRouteResult.RouteResult
member.summary: The route result.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetRouteResult.Exception
member.summary: The exception when getting route.

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetServiceAreaOptions
member.summary: A class provides the options for the GetServiceArea API.
member.remarks: A class provides the options for the GetServiceArea API.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetServiceAreaOptions.DistanceUnit
member.summary: The unit of measure in which to express the length of route. Defaults to Meter.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetServiceAreaOptions.ContourGranularity
member.summary: A float in the range of (0, 1.0) to identify how much we want to remove the contours. 0 means do not remove any contour at all, 1.0 means only return the largest contour. Defaults to 1.0.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetServiceAreaOptions.CoordinateSnapRadius
member.summary: The maximum distance of a coordinate can be snapped to the road network. Defaults to 5000 meters.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetServiceAreaOptions.CoordinateSnapRadiusUnit
member.summary: The unit of the radius to snap the input coordinate to road network.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetServiceAreaOptions.GridSizeInMeters
member.summary: A float value in meters used as the tolerance for concave polygon. The smaller of the number is getting more accurate of the service areas but slower performance, better a value bigger than 300, but depends on the size of the result coverage. Defaults to 400.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetServiceAreaOptions.ServiceAreaSeparationType
member.summary: Specify whether to include the region covered by the smaller service area into the region covered by the larger service area. Defaults to Separated.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetServiceAreaOptions.ServiceAreaType
member.summary: Indicates whether the result is returned in polygon cancaved from accessing roads, or the linestrings as roads. Defaults to Polygon.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetServiceAreaOptions.TravelDirection
member.summary: Indicates the direction of travel to or from the coordinates. Defaults to From.

member.summary: The service area result.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.Cloud.RoutingGetServiceAreaResult.Exception
member.summary: The exception when getting service area.
